pullRequest.title: fix: duplicate envFrom in k8s manifests
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request fixes the presence of duplicate envFrom entries appearing in the manifests.
We recently fixes duplicate env variables, but mised this case.
Fixes: #7740

commit.message: fix: duplicate envFrom in k8s manifests

nodes.bodyText: Maybe we should also assert that container.getEnv() is null?
